Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<MessageToServer>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.ClientView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllableByViewMessage, Observer<MessageToView>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUI, StubView
public abstract class ClientView
extends View
implements Observer<MessageToView>, ControllableByViewMessage

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract void changeState​(java.lang.String state)
    Method that notify with a message the view the state of the turn
    abstract void deactivatePower()
    Method used to deactivate the god power after using it called in ClientManager after sending the UsePowerMessage
    abstract void init()
    Method that initialize the view it prepares the representation of the game in the client side
    abstract void receiveErrorMessage​(java.lang.String error)
    When the client receives an error it send it to the view
    abstract void receiveInputCli()
    Method used in cli to receive cell in input
    abstract void removeActionsFromView()
    Method used in gui to update and delete the old possible moves
    abstract void showActionPositions​(java.util.List<Position> possiblePosition, boolean isPowerCells)
    Method used to show to the view the cells where a player can make an action
    abstract void showCurrentPlayer​(PlayerIndex currentPlayer)
    Method that show the current player to the view
    abstract void showGetNickname()
    Show the input request for the nickname If player index is PLAYER0 it shows also the selection of the number of players of the game
    abstract void showGodLikeChoice​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> gods)
    Show to the view the list of gods that the godLike player has to choose
    abstract void showGodLikeChooseFirstPlayer()
    Show to the godLike the selection panel to choose who will be the first player of the game
    abstract void showGodToSelect​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> godLikeGods)
    Show to the view the list of gods that a player (not the godLike) can choose
    abstract void showMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    Generic method to show a message to the view
    abstract java.lang.String showSelectIP​(java.lang.String message)
    Show to the view the input panel to insert the ip of the server
    void update​(MessageToView message)  
    void updateClientIndex​(ConnectionPlayerIndexMessage message)
    Method that update the view when a player connects
